pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-4771: Update Load tile
pullRequest.bodyText:
Includes:

removing Files information from Load cards
rewriting switch view component, using MLRadio component from Design System
adding tests for LoadData component
renaming page component names to match UI names (Curate, Load, Run)

Description
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText: Should this still be loadContainer, even though it's for the match card? Perhaps a more general name - these are all steps, so "stepContainer"?

commit.message:
DHFPROD-4771: Update Load tile

Includes:
- removing Files information from Load cards
- rewriting switch view component, using MLRadio component from Design System
- adding tests for LoadData component
- renaming page component names to match UI names (Curate, Load, Run)
